revised_title: Observations on the Development of Striated Muscular Fibre in Tadpoles, Chick, Sheep, and Human Embryos
tldr: The author investigates the development of striated muscular fibre in various organisms, including tadpoles, chick, sheep, and human embryos. Through detailed observations and analysis, the author provides insights into the structure and differentiation of muscle cells, as well as the role of nuclei and membrane in muscle development.
